org.miloss.fgsms.common

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.miloss.fgsms.common.Utility

  • public class Utility
extends Object
    fgsms's Utility functions - Ahh the good old Utility class. containsPolicyType string functions, friendly name conversions, serialization contexts and more. This also is the place to go to for JDBC connections
    Author:
    AO

      • parseDateTime

        public static Calendar parseDateTime(String s)
                              throws Exception
        Parses the date/time stamp from a given input parameter using one of the following formats
        • mm/dd/yyyy
        • mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss
        • EEE MMM dd HH:mm:ss zzz yyyy - this is the standard output from the unix date command
        • EEE mm/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss.ms - this is the standard output from the windows command echo %date% %time%
        • yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.zzzzzzz
        • Epoch time (ms)
        • PnYnMnDTnHnMnS - XML lexical representation
        Parameters:
        s - the input string
        Returns:
        a non-null instance of Calendar matching the interpreted date.
        Throws:
        Exception - if the date cannot be parsed

        public static JAXBContext getSerializationContext()
                                           throws JAXBException

        Returns:
        Throws:
        JAXBException

      • DE

        public static String DE(String cipher)
        Decrypts a password or other sensitive data. If the parameter is null or empty, an empty string is returned. If the parameter is not encrypted or was encrypted using a different key or it fails to decrypt, the original text is returned.
        Parameters:
        cipher -
        Returns:

      • getPerformanceDB_NONPOOLED_Connection

        @Deprecated
public static Connection getPerformanceDB_NONPOOLED_Connection()
        Deprecated. 
        returns a NON pooled database connection by using the data in the database.properties if the primary cannot be reached, the secondary is used or null is returned. configuration is loaded from the database.properties embedded within fgsms.common.jar
        Returns:

      • getConfigurationDB_NONPOOLED_Connection

        @Deprecated
public static Connection getConfigurationDB_NONPOOLED_Connection()
        Deprecated. 
        returns a NON pooled database connection by using the data in the database.properties if the primary cannot be reached, the secondary is used or null is returned. configuration is loaded from the database.properties embedded within fgsms.common.jar
        Returns:

      • getPerformanceDBConnection

        public static Connection getPerformanceDBConnection()
        returns a JDNI pooled database connection if the primary cannot be reached, the secondary is used or null is returned. java:fgsmsPerformance java:fgsmsPerformanceSecondary be sure to close the connection when finished
        Returns:
        null if a connection cannot be established

      • getConfigurationDBConnection

        public static Connection getConfigurationDBConnection()
        returns a JDNI pooled database connection if the primary cannot be reached, the secondary is used or null is returned. java:fgsmsConfig java:fgsmsConfigSecondary
        Returns:
